name: aintohvri/docker-httpd Docker container
description: Apache HTTPD Docker extension for legacy PHP versions
readme:
# docker-httpd

Docker HTTPD extension for legacy PHP versions.

## Software

Image is based on Apache's [httpd:2.2](https://github.com/docker-library/httpd), extended with:

- PHP 5.1.3
- SSMTP

## Configuration

- For email delivery with `mail()`, `/etc/ssmtp/ssmtp.conf` needs to be configured with appropriate credentials.

## Licence

Copyright Â© 2016 Ain Tohvri, [contributors](https://github.com/ain/docker-httpd/graphs/contributors). Licenced under [GPL-3](https://github.com/ain/docker-httpd/blob/master/LICENSE).
dockerfile:
FROM httpd:2.2

ENV PHP_VERSION 5.1.3

RUN echo "deb http://httpredir.debian.org/debian wheezy main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/wheezy.list
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -t wheezy -y libxml2 \
  libxml2-dev \
  libxpm4 \
  libxpm-dev \
  libxslt1.1 \
  libxslt1-dev
RUN ln -s /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXpm.so /usr/lib/libXpm.so
RUN ln -s /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmysqlclient.so /usr/lib/libmysqlclient.so

RUN apt-get install -y build-essential \
  libssl-dev \
  libsqlite3-dev \
  librecode-dev \
  libreadline6-dev \
  libcurl4-openssl-dev \
  pkg-config \
  libgdbm-dev \
  m4 \
  flex \
  wget \
  vim \
  libpng12-0 \
  libpng12-dev \
  libxpm4 \
  libxpm-dev \
  libmysqlclient-dev \
  mysql-client \
  ssmtp

RUN cd /tmp && wget https://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/httpd-2.2.31.tar.gz \
  && tar xzvf httpd-2.2.31.tar.gz \
  && /usr/local/apache2/bin/apxs -c -i /tmp/httpd-2.2.31/modules/mappers/mod_rewrite.c

RUN cd /tmp && wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/bison/bison-2.1.tar.gz \
  && tar xzvf bison-2.1.tar.gz \
  && cd bison-2.1 \
  && ./configure \
  && make \
  && make install \
  && make clean

RUN apt-get install -y libfreetype6-dev
RUN cd /tmp && wget http://iweb.dl.sourceforge.net/project/freetype/freetype2/2.6/freetype-2.6.tar.gz \
  && tar xzvf freetype-2.6.tar.gz \
  && cd freetype-2.6 \
  && ./configure \
  && make \
  && make install \
  && make clean

RUN mkdir -p /usr/include/freetype2/freetype
RUN ln -s /usr/include/freetype2/freetype.h /usr/include/freetype2/freetype/freetype.h

RUN cd /tmp && wget http://ftp.gnu.org/pub/gnu/libiconv/libiconv-1.11.tar.gz \
  && tar xzvf libiconv-1.11.tar.gz \
  && cd libiconv-1.11 \
  && ./configure \
  && make \
  && make install \
  && make clean

RUN cd /tmp && wget http://www.ijg.org/files/jpegsrc.v9a.tar.gz \
  && tar xzvf jpegsrc.v9a.tar.gz \
  && cd jpeg-9a \
  && ./configure \
  && make \
  && make install \
  && make clean

RUN ln -s /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpng.so /usr/lib/libpng.so

RUN cd /tmp && wget "http://museum.php.net/php5/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.gz" \
  && tar xzvf "php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.gz" \
  && cd "php-$PHP_VERSION" \
  && ./configure --enable-bcmath --with-xsl --enable-fastcgi --enable-force-cgi-redirect --with-gd --enable-sockets --with-mysql=/usr/ --with-gettext --enable-mbstring --with-xpm-dir=/usr/lib --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ --with-gdbm=/usr/lib --with-zlib-dir=/usr/lib --with-freetype-dir=/usr/lib --with-iconv=/usr/local/lib --with-xml --with-dom --with-config-file=/etc/php5.ini --with-openssl-dir=/usr/include/openssl --enable-memory-limit --with-pdo-mysql=/usr/ --with-apxs2 --enable-so --without-pear \
  && make \
  && make install \
  && make clean

COPY ./httpd.conf /usr/local/apache2/conf/httpd.conf

COPY ./php.ini /usr/local/lib/php.ini

RUN echo "FromLineOverride=YES" >> /etc/ssmtp/ssmtp.conf

RUN ln -s /usr/local/apache2/htdocs /var/www

run: apt-get update && apt-get install -t wheezy -y libxml2   libxml2-dev   libxpm4   libxpm-dev   libxslt1.1   libxslt1-dev

apt-get install -y build-essential   libssl-dev   libsqlite3-dev   librecode-dev   libreadline6-dev   libcurl4-openssl-dev   pkg-config   libgdbm-dev   m4   flex   wget   vim   libpng12-0   libpng12-dev   libxpm4   libxpm-dev   libmysqlclient-dev   mysql-client   ssmtp
cd /tmp && wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/bison/bison-2.1.tar.gz   && tar xzvf bison-2.1.tar.gz   && cd bison-2.1   && ./configure   && make   && make install   && make clean

cd /tmp && wget http://iweb.dl.sourceforge.net/project/freetype/freetype2/2.6/freetype-2.6.tar.gz   && tar xzvf freetype-2.6.tar.gz   && cd freetype-2.6   && ./configure   && make   && make install   && make clean
cd /tmp && wget http://ftp.gnu.org/pub/gnu/libiconv/libiconv-1.11.tar.gz   && tar xzvf libiconv-1.11.tar.gz   && cd libiconv-1.11   && ./configure   && make   && make install   && make clean
cd /tmp && wget http://www.ijg.org/files/jpegsrc.v9a.tar.gz   && tar xzvf jpegsrc.v9a.tar.gz   && cd jpeg-9a   && ./configure   && make   && make install   && make clean

cd /tmp && wget "http://museum.php.net/php5/php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.gz"   && tar xzvf "php-$PHP_VERSION.tar.gz"   && cd "php-$PHP_VERSION"   && ./configure --enable-bcmath --with-xsl --enable-fastcgi --enable-force-cgi-redirect --with-gd --enable-sockets --with-mysql=/usr/ --with-gettext --enable-mbstring --with-xpm-dir=/usr/lib --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ --with-gdbm=/usr/lib --with-zlib-dir=/usr/lib --with-freetype-dir=/usr/lib --with-iconv=/usr/local/lib --with-xml --with-dom --with-config-file=/etc/php5.ini --with-openssl-dir=/usr/include/openssl --enable-memory-limit --with-pdo-mysql=/usr/ --with-apxs2 --enable-so --without-pear   && make   && make install   && make clean
